title: Your Keys to a New Beginning! 2 Bedroom Apartment Home for You!
map_address: 827 Park Ave West near Park Ave and Stout Street
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Affordable apartments at $700 less than nearby communities!', 'Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily online.', 'First come first serve -- apartments are going fast!', 'Located in the highly favorable LoDo neighborhood in Denver, Colorado, Park Avenue West would like to welcome you home!', 'Our community offers 2 bedroom apartment homes.', 'With the incredible amenities our community offers, we rarely have apartments available so hurry and reserve yours today!', 'As a resident you will enjoy the community clubroom, garage parking, 2 sundecks and beautiful views.', 'Our apartment amenities provide you with the convenience of an in-home washer and dryer and gourmet kitchens with ample counter top and cabinet space.', 'Call today for more information & reserve your new home!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Gourmet-Style Kitchen Layout with Center Island (select homes)', '- Upgraded Kitchen Cabinetry & Granite Countertops', '- New On-Site Fitness Center - COMPLETE!', '- One Heated Underground Parking Garage Space Included', '- Professional, On-Site Management Team', '- Full-Size Stackable Washer & Dryer', 'In EVERY Home!', '- Renovated Community Room with Cozy Fireplace - COMPLETE!', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', 'See Respective Floor Plan -', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'Park Avenue West', '827 Park Avenue West', 'Denver, CO, 80205', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'WYnVM34OSAf']
